{{Description|One day, while stopping by the [[Adventurers' Guild]], you and [[Paimon]] receive a mysterious commission from an "organization whose details may not be disclosed." It seems that this might just be a toughie...}}
'''On the Trail of Behemoths''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2025/01/14 10:00 - 2025/01/27 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 30 or above
* Complete Archon Quest [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"

===Summary===
* Complete challenge objectives of different difficulties to obtain [[Primogem]]s, [[Sanctifying Unction]], [[Weapon Ascension Material]]s, and other rewards.
* From the first day of the event, you will be able to unlock the corresponding challenge every 2 days. You can speak to [[Helka]] and engage in challenges of different difficulties.
* In Fearless difficulty, you can also adjust the number of selected Special Topics provided by Helka. More Special Topics selected will make for a more difficult challenge.
* Complete challenge objectives at different difficulties to obtain the corresponding ratings and rewards.
* A maximum of two players can carry out the challenge in [[Co-Op Mode]].
* Only challenge records achieved in Single-Player Mode can be reviewed or exhibited.

===Why Do the Automata Stand Tall in the Ruins?===
Unlocks 2025-01-14 10{{Colon}}00
* Opponent: {{Enemy|Secret Source Automaton: Firepower Enhanced}}

;Opponent's Details
* A manufacturing machine with fully upgraded weapons and armor. When characters enter and maintain the Nightsoul's Blessing state, the Secret Source Automaton: Firepower Enhanced will start progressing through its Adaptive Countermeasures. Once those are complete, it will start preparing its Boltsphere Cannon. During this time, the Secret Source Automaton: Firepower Enhanced will start up its Accretion Mechanism to dig into Solid Phlogiston and collect phlogiston. The Accretion Mechanism will generate an energy field. If you wish to destroy the Mechanism and interrupt the charging of the Boltsphere Cannon, {{Color|help|you must first climb the Solid Phlogiston and enter the energy field.}}

;Opponent's Details - Combat Essentials
* Destroy the Accretion Mechanism to interrupt the charging of the Boltsphere Cannon
* Being in the Nightsoul's Blessing state gives an advantage

;Special Topics<ref group="Note" name="onlyFearless">Special Topics can only be adjusted on Fearless difficulty</ref>
{|class="article-table"
!Name
!Description
|-
|Research Topic: Key Function Survey
|Enhances Accretion Mechanism by increasing the height of excavated solid Phlogiston pillars.
|-
|Research Topic: Area Obliteration Cannon
|Enhances Boltsphere Cannon so that it downs all characters currently on the field. Additionally, while Boltsphere Cannon is being charged up, Secret Source Automaton: Firepower Enhanced's Physical and All Elemental RES will be increased.
|-
|Research Topic: Max Power Test
|Increases Secret Source Automaton: Firepower Enhanced's ATK by 120%.
|-
|Research Topic: Sweeper Cannon
|During the challenge, Secret Source Automaton: Firepower Enhanced will use its rear section to absorb phlogiston directly, creating an Active Phlogiston Zone and performing a cone-shaped Sweeper Cannon attack.<br>While within the Active Phlogiston Zone, characters will continuously replenish phlogiston.
|-
!colspan=2|Bonus Topic<ref group="Note" name="allTopics">Only active if all four special topics are selected</ref>
|-
|colspan=2|Never get hit by the Sweeper Cannon
|}

;Opponent's Details
* A torrent formed from the convergence of innumerable living wills. During the challenge, small Half-Tulpas will constantly appear and fight against their opponents. Hydro Tulpa: Flashflood will absorb all of the Half-Tulpas on the field into itself to grow stronger. {{Color|help|Defeat the Half-Tulpas or render them immobile}} to disrupt the absorption process.

;Opponent's Details - Combat Essentials
* Defeat the Half-Tulpas or render them immobile to prevent Hydro Tulpa: Flashflood from growing stronger during battle
* {{Pyro}} and {{Dendro}} characters have an advantage

;Special Topics<ref group="Note" name="onlyFearless" />
{|class="article-table"
!Name
!Description
|-
|Research Topic: Complex Scenario Analysis
|Each time a Half-Tulpa appears during the challenge, the number of Half-Tulpas on the field will be replenished to 3.
|-
|Research Topic: Environment Enhancement Experiment
|Half-Tulpas are harder to defeat with attacks and Elemental Reactions.
|-
|Research Topic: Monster Threat Assessment
|Increases Hydro Tulpa: Flashflood and Half-Tulpas' ATK by 120%.
|-
|Research Topic: Devastating Torrent
|During the challenge, Hydro Tulpa: Flashflood will enter a charging state as it prepares to unleash Devastating Torrent. When it unleashes Devastating Torrent, all characters currently on the field will be downed. While charging, Hydro Tulpa: Flashflood will activate a Shield that regenerates Elemental Energy and Fighting Spirit for characters in your party and resets the CDs of Elemental Skills and Bursts. If the Shield is broken, the charging of Devastating Torrent will be interrupted.
|-
!colspan=2|Bonus Topic<ref group="Note" name="allTopics" />
|-
|colspan=2|Never allow a Half-Tulpa to be absorbed
|}

;Opponent's Details
* The lord of molten fire, capable of boiling lakes, stands proudly at the pinnacle of nearly all Armored Crabs. The twin molten horns located high up on its body are {{Color|help|Pyro-aligned}} organs that can unleash more vicious elemental attacks and grant it even stronger defensive capabilities. When the twin molten horns are about to be broken, the Tyrant of Fire and Iron will start trying to repair them. Once it has finished doing so, the Tyrant of Fire and Iron's pincers will be imbued with Molten Might, enabling it to launch a powerful counterattack.

;Opponent's Details - Combat Essentials
* Destroy the Pyro-aligned twin molten horns to break through its defenses and halt the momentum of its attacks
* {{Hydro}} characters have an advantage

;Special Topics<ref group="Note" name="onlyFearless" />
{|class="article-table"
!Name
!Description
|-
|Research Topic: Environment Enhancement Experiment
|The Tyrant of Fire and Iron's twin molten horns will be harder to break, and the Physical and All Elemental RES that they provide it with will be further increased.
|-
|Research Topic: Molten Throne
|After the Tyrant of Fire and Iron performs a leaping strike, the area hit by the attack will become a Molten Throne. After the Tyrant of Fire and Iron has been within the Molten Throne area for a period of time, it will start to constantly regenerate HP.
|-
|Research Topic: Monster Threat Assessment
|Increases the Tyrant of Fire and Iron's ATK by 120%.
|-
|Research Topic: Blazing Coronation
|During the challenge, the Tyrant of Fire and Iron will use its twin molten horns to absorb the power of lava and charge up Blazing Coronation. Aside from downing all characters currently on the field, Blazing Coronation will also repair the Tyrant of Fire and Iron's twin molten horns. When all lava crystals on the field are destroyed, Blazing Coronation's charging will be interrupted and the Tyrant of Fire and Iron's twin molten horns will suffer backlash DMG instead.
|-
!colspan=2|Bonus Topic<ref group="Note" name="allTopics" />
|-
|colspan=2|Do not allow the opponent to successfully use Blazing Coronation
|}
